summary.para: An 'improved' which caches often used properties

member.name: T:SeedFinder.Curve.Utility.CubicHermiteCalculator
member.summary:
Provides the under-the-hood calculations needed for a Cubic Hermite curve.
This is a Cubic curve that where the 2 control points are defined by a weight and a tangent from the start and end points

member.name: F:SeedFinder.Curve.Utility.CubicHermiteCalculator.Xi
member.summary:
A mathematical constant used for getting the roots of a cubic equation.
(-1 + √-3) / 2
Symbol: ξ

member.name: M:SeedFinder.Curve.Utility.CubicHermiteCalculator.CalculateControlPoints(SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point@,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point@)
member.summary: Calculates the right control point for the start keyframe and the left control point for the end keyframe and returns them as out parameters

member.name: M:SeedFinder.Curve.Utility.CubicHermiteCalculator.CalculateControlPoint1(SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame)
member.summary: Calculates the control point to the right of the start keyframe

member.name: M:SeedFinder.Curve.Utility.CubicHermiteCalculator.CalculateControlPoint2(SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame)
member.summary: Calculates the control point to the left of the end keyframe

member.name: M:SeedFinder.Curve.Utility.CubicHermiteCalculator.EvaluateCurve(System.Double,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point)
member.summary: Evaluate the Cubic Hermite curve that is defined by the start and end points and 2 control points
member.returns: the y value of the evaluated x coordinate on the curve

member.name: M:SeedFinder.Curve.Utility.CubicHermiteCalculator.GetPointOnCurve(System.Double,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point)
member.summary: Gives a point on the curve depending on the value of t. With t = 0 being the start and t = 1 being the end.
member.warning: While this does allow one to trace the curve easily, t does not equate to a % along the curve and should not be used for constant steps

member.name: M:SeedFinder.Curve.Utility.CubicHermiteCalculator.Delta(System.Double,SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.Point)
member.summary: Returns the difference towards the start coordinate

member.summary: Calculates a root of the polynomial equation using the complex number from and ensures the result is real.

member.summary: Calculates a root of the polynomial equation using the complex number from and ensures the result is real.

member.name: T:SeedFinder.Curve.CubicHermiteCurve
member.summary:
The implementation of a Cubic Hermite curve.
This is a Cubic curve that where the 2 control points are defined by a weight and a tangent from the start and end points.
The behaviour of this curve is identical to Unitys AnimationCurve

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.CubicHermiteCurve.PreWrapMode
member.summary: How evaluating a point that falls to the left of the curve should be handled

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.CubicHermiteCurve.PostWrapMode
member.summary: How evaluating a point that falls to the right of the curve should be handled

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.CubicHermiteCurve.KeyFrames
member.summary: All the keyframes that belong to this curve, sorted by their x coordinates.

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.CubicHermiteCurve.StartPoint
member.summary: The first keyframe of this curve

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.CubicHermiteCurve.EndPoint
member.summary: The last keyframe of this curve

member.name: M:SeedFinder.Curve.CubicHermiteCurve.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new Cubic Hermite curve with no keyframes

member.summary: Creates a new Cubic Hermite curve with the given keyframes

member.summary: Creates a new Cubic Hermite curve with the given keyframes

member.summary: Evaluate the curve at the given x coordinate
member.param: The X coordnate to evaluate
member.returns: The Y coordinate of the point on the curve that has the given X coordinate

member.summary: Evaluate the curve at the given x coordinate
member.param: The X coordnate to evaluate
How to handle a point that falls outside the curve, before the first keyframe
How to handle a point that falls outside the curve, after the last keyframe
member.returns: The Y coordinate of the point on the curve that has the given X coordinate

member.summary: How to handle evaluating a point outside of the defined curve

member.summary: Repeat the curve ad ininitum

member.summary: Repeat the curve ad infinitum, but reverse the curve every other cycle

member.name: F:SeedFinder.Curve.Enums.CurveWrapMode.Clamp
member.summary: Return the value at the start/end point

member.name: T:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame
member.summary:
Represents a x and y coordinate on the curve.
Also contains a weight and a tangent for a cubic hermite curve

member.summary: Creates a new keyframe with the given coordinates, and optionally the weights and tangents

member.summary: Creates a new keyframe with the coordinates from the given points, and optionally the weights and tangents

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.x
member.summary: The X coordinate (Time) of this keyframe

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.y
member.summary: The Y coordinate (Value) of this keyframe

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.Position
member.summary: The position of this keyframe

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.UseWeightForLeftControlPoint
member.summary: Whether or not the weight should be used when calculating the left control point of this keyframe

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.UseWeightForRightControlPoint
member.summary: Whether or not the weight should be used when calculating the right control point of this keyframe

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.InTangent
member.summary:
The tangent on the left side of this keyframe.
Use Infinity if you want to use a constant for this curve:
= start value (other keyframe)
= end value (this keyframe)

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.InWeight
member.summary:
The weight used to calculate the control point on the left of this keyframe.
It is represented by a normalized value [0, 1] between this keyframe and the one before it

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.OutTangent
member.summary:
The tangent on the right side of this keyframe.
Use Infinity if you want to use a constant for this curve:
= start value (this keyframe)
= end value (other keyframe)

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.OutWeight
member.summary:
The weight used to calculate the control point on the right of this keyframe.
It is represented by a normalized value [0, 1] between this keyframe and the one after it

member.summary: The control point to the left of this keyframe

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.RightControlPoint
member.summary: The control point to the right of this keyframe

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.HasCalculatedLeftControlPoint
member.summary: Whether or not the left control point has been calculated with the latest data set

member.name: P:SeedFinder.Curve.Structs.KeyFrame.HasCalculatedRightControlPoint
member.summary: Whether or not the right control point has been calculated with the latest data set

member.summary: Calculate the left control point of this keyframe
member.param: A keyframe to the left of this keyframe that will serve as the begin point of the cubic hermite curve

member.summary: Calculate the right control point of this keyframe
member.param: A keyframe to the right of this keyframe that will serve as the end point of the cubic hermite curve
